"Ah, hey, hey, hey, it's you!": "You well? You're well... In fact, you look perfectly fine."
"Lisa's just going on a stroll. No mood to really just linger around the ARKS Ship."
"It's a completely different feeling of tension than last time's Dark Falz revival."
"It's a tingly feeling inside instead of outside. It's really stimulating."
"All of this really invokes some incredible nostalgia."
"Well, I can't really remember how long ago that was."
"Even so... Aah, even so, I'm so jealous since it seems so fun!"
"Have you noticed? This is one big tingly spiral centered around you."
"I wonder what's going on. Aah, so envious, so envious! I want to jump into that vortex and shoot and shoot and shoot everything down!..."
"But, Lisa's got a good conscience, so none of that's going to happen. Rest assured, fufufu."
